changeSet.sql: update user_client_role set normalized_name = rtrim(ltrim(lower(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(name,'.',''),'\',''),'-',''),'\''',''),'=',''),'_',''),';',''),':',''),'`',''),'@',''),'#',''),'&',''),',',''),'!',''),'(',''),')',''),'/',''),' ','') ))) where normalized_name is null

DELETE from user_client_role_user_client_permission where role_id in ( SELECT id FROM user_client_role ucr inner join ( SELECT client_id, normalized_name, count(*) as c FROM user_client_role group by client_id, normalized_name having count(*) > 1 ) AS DUP ON ucr.client_id = DUP.client_id and ucr.normalized_name = DUP.normalized_name)

DELETE from user_client_role where id in ( SELECT id FROM user_client_role ucr inner join ( SELECT client_id, normalized_name, count(*) as c FROM user_client_role group by client_id, normalized_name having count(*) > 1 ) AS DUP ON ucr.client_id = DUP.client_id and ucr.normalized_name = DUP.normalized_name)
